title: Alaphilippe, Hirschi, and a Bunch of Brainiacs: Inside Team Tudor’s Quest to Conquer the WorldTour
content:
'We can be a major player': Cancellara’s Tudor Pro Cycling project was the winner of the transfer market. Next? Crush the classics and take on the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Alaphilippe, Hirschi, and a Bunch of Brainiacs: Inside Team Tudor’s Quest to Conquer the WorldTour on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
